content: This topic was moved by Till Schneidereit to #wamr > WAMR contributions
(I moved this into the wamr stream for more visibility)

"When working with WAMR and exceptions, is there any way to configure a callback (native function) to be triggered by WAMR whenever an exception in the WAMR domain occurs? I found wasm_runtime_set_enlarge_mem_error_callback, so I am looking for something similar but for any type of exception.
